description: Rome turns out to be anything but a business trip in this final installment of Lisa Sumils' mini-series. What was once an innocent love-affair has turned into a messy and dangerous relationship. When one party has nothing to lose, she will do everything in her power to take back what was once hers. Sophia is determined to end Melanie King and Warren Brown is, of course, going to do everything to save her. Will this be what brings Melanie and Zach back together or is it what will forever tear them apart? What lengths will Sophia go to, to bring Warren back? Melanie is no longer fighting for what her heart wants, she is fighting for survival.T.M. Williams' final installment in the popular Melanie King love affair is the climax everyone has been waiting for.
title:
Moonlight
      
          (A Melanie King Affair)
